            </Grid>
        </Border>

        <!-- Main Content Area -->
        <Grid Grid.Row="1" Margin="10">

            <!-- Left Column -->
            <StackPanel Grid.Column="0">
                <!-- Connection Section -->
                <Border Style="{StaticResource CardPanel}">
                    <StackPanel>
                        <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource SectionHeader}" Text="Connection"/>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>

                        </Grid>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>

                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="Baud Rate" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
                            <TextBox Grid.Column="1" x:Name="BaudRateTextBox" Text="115200"/>
                        </Grid>
                        <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,10,0,0">
                            <Button x:Name="ConnectButton" Content="Connect" Click="ConnectButton_Click"/>
                            <Button x:Name="DisconnectButton" Content="Disconnect" Style="{StaticResource SecondaryButton}" Click="DisconnectButton_Click"/>
                        </StackPanel>
                        <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0,10,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
                            <Ellipse Width="10" Height="10" Fill="#00FF00" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,5,0"/>
                            <TextBlock x:Name="ConnectionStatusTextBlock" Text="Status: Connected to COM3" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>
                        </StackPanel>
                    </StackPanel>
                </Border>

                <!-- Machine Settings Section -->
                <Border Style="{StaticResource CardPanel}">
                    <StackPanel>
                        <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource SectionHeader}" Text="Machine Settings"/>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="Steps/mm (X)" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
                            <TextBox Grid.Column="1" x:Name="StepsPerMmXTextBox" Text="200"/>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="Steps/mm (Y)" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
                            <TextBox Grid.Column="1" x:Name="StepsPerMmYTextBox" Text="200"/>
                        </Grid>
                        <CheckBox x:Name="EnableLimitSwitchesCheckBox" Content="Enable Limit Switches" IsChecked="True" Margin="0,10,0,0"/>
                        <CheckBox x:Name="EnableHomingCheckBox" Content="Enable Homing"/>
                        <Button x:Name="SaveSettingsButton" Content="Save Settings" Margin="0,15,0,0" Click="SaveSettingsButton_Click"/>
                    </StackPanel>
                </Border>
            </StackPanel>

            <!-- Middle Column -->
            <StackPanel Grid.Column="1">
                <!-- Manual Jog Controls Section -->
                <Border Style="{StaticResource CardPanel}">
                    <StackPanel>
                        <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource SectionHeader}" Text="Manual Jog Controls"/>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="Jog increment (mm)" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
                            <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" x:Name="JogIncrementComboBox" SelectedIndex="1">
                                <ComboBoxItem Content="0.01"/>
                                <ComboBoxItem Content="0.1"/>
                                <ComboBoxItem Content="1"/>
                                <ComboBoxItem Content="10"/>
                            </ComboBox>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid Margin="0,15,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <Grid.RowDefinitions>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                            </Grid.RowDefinitions>

                            <!-- Jog Buttons -->
                            <Button Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Content="" Width="40" Height="40" Click="JogUpButton_Click"/>
                            <Button Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Content="" Width="40" Height="40" Click="JogLeftButton_Click"/>
                            <Button Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Content="" Width="40" Height="40" Style="{StaticResource SecondaryButton}" Click="CenterButton_Click"/>
                            <Button Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2" Content="" Width="40" Height="40" Click="JogRightButton_Click"/>
                            <Button Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Content="" Width="40" Height="40" Click="JogDownButton_Click"/>
                        </Grid>
                    </StackPanel>
                </Border>

                <!-- Go To Position Section -->
                <Border Style="{StaticResource CardPanel}">
                    <StackPanel>
                        <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource SectionHeader}" Text="Go To Position"/>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="X Position" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
                            <TextBox Grid.Column="1" x:Name="XPositionTextBox" Text="0.00"/>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="Y Position" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
                            <TextBox Grid.Column="1" x:Name="YPositionTextBox" Text="0.00"/>
                        </Grid>
                        <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,10,0,0">
                            <Button x:Name="GoButton" Content="Go" Click="GoButton_Click"/>
                            <Button x:Name="HomeButton" Content="Home" Style="{StaticResource SecondaryButton}" Click="HomeButton_Click"/>
                        </StackPanel>
                    </StackPanel>
                </Border>
            </StackPanel>

            <!-- Right Column -->
            <StackPanel Grid.Column="2">
                <!-- G-Code File Section -->
                <Border Style="{StaticResource CardPanel}">
                    <StackPanel>
                        <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource SectionHeader}" Text="G-Code File"/>
                        <Button x:Name="LoadGCodeFileButton" Content="Load G-Code File" Margin="0,0,0,10" Click="LoadGCodeFileButton_Click"/>

                            <Border Background="#2D2D2D" BorderBrush="#3F3F3F" BorderThickness="1" CornerRadius="5" Padding="10" Margin="0,2">

                                    <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>

                                        <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/>

                                    <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Text="12.5KB" HorizontalAlignment="Right" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>
                                </Grid>
                            </Border>
                            <Border Background="#2D2D2D" BorderBrush="#3F3F3F" BorderThickness="1" CornerRadius="5" Padding="10" Margin="0,2">
                                <Grid>

                                    <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Text="test_cut.nc" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>
                                    <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Text="8.2KB" HorizontalAlignment="Right" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>
                                </Grid>
                            </Border>

                                    <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Text="22.0KB" HorizontalAlignment="Right" VerticalAlignment="Center"/>
                                </Grid>
                            </Border>
                        </StackPanel>
                        <TextBlock Text="Job Progress" Margin="0,10,0,5"/>
                        <ProgressBar Value="45" Height="10" Background="#2D2D2D" BorderBrush="#3F3F3F" BorderThickness="1" Foreground="#007ACC"/>
                        <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,10,0,0">
                            <Button x:Name="StartButton" Content="Start" Click="StartButton_Click"/>
                            <Button x:Name="PauseButton" Content="Pause" Style="{StaticResource SecondaryButton}" Click="PauseButton_Click"/>
                            <Button x:Name="ResumeButton" Content="Resume" Style="{StaticResource SecondaryButton}" Click="ResumeButton_Click"/>
                            <Button x:Name="StopButton" Content="Stop" Style="{StaticResource SecondaryButton}" Click="StopButton_Click"/>
                        </StackPanel>
                    </StackPanel>
                </Border>

                <!-- Status & Feedback Section -->
                <Border Style="{StaticResource CardPanel}">
                    <StackPanel>
                        
                        <TextBlock Text="Console"/>
                        <Border Background="#2D2D2D" BorderBrush="#3F3F3F" BorderThickness="1" CornerRadius="5" Height="120" Padding="5">

                                <TextBlock x:Name="ConsoleOutputTextBlock" TextWrapping="Wrap"
                                           Text="[10:35:12] Connecting to COM3...&#x0a;[10:35:13] Connection successful.&#x0a;[10:35:15] Homing initiated...&#x0a;[10:35:18] Homing complete.&#x0a;[10:36:01] G0 X20 Y20 F1000"/>
                            </ScrollViewer>
                        </Border>
                        <Grid Margin="0,10,0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <Grid.RowDefinitions>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                            </Grid.RowDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="Current X" FontWeight="Bold"/>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Text="Current Y" FontWeight="Bold"/>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" x:Name="CurrentXTextBlock" Text="10.00 mm"/>

                        </Grid>
                        <Grid Margin="0,5">
                            <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                                <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/>
                            </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
                            <Grid.RowDefinitions>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                                <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
                            </Grid.RowDefinitions>
                            <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="Feed Rate" FontWeight="Bold"/>

                            <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" x:Name="SpindleSpeedTextBlock" Text="12000 RPM"/>
                        </Grid>
                    </StackPanel>
                </Border>
            </StackPanel>
        </Grid>
    </Grid>
</Window>
